price: (Kardeşleri) dediler ki: Allah'a andolsun, hakikaten Allah seni bize üstün kılmış. Gerçekten biz hataya düşmüşüz.
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدۡ ءَاثَرَكَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَإِن كُنَّا لَخَٰطِـِٔينَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi laqad ātharaka al-lahu ʿalaynā wa-in kunnā lakhāṭiīna
